The news of the change rocked Silicon Valley, with analysts and company insiders offering varying theories. Some said Mr. Eric Schmidt was tired of the day-to-day hassles of management. Mr. Eric Schmidt said in the interview, I would tell you, frankly, a decade is a long time to be a C.E.O., and Larry will discover this.
